name: The Grid 2.0
description:
The Grid 2.0 is a sequel from the game The Grid made previously under the prompt of a 1-Button game by Justina and Shantanu.

In the game, player will navigate through the hazardous environment called The Grid. In this sequel, the player will be faced with the same dangerous spinning blades that populate The Grid. However, this time, there's also a new enemy: The magenta AI bots that will chase after the player and will kill the player upon one touch. In order to counter the new enemy, the player is also given the ability to shoot and obtain shield for protection. The goal is still the same: to collect as much green orbs as possible to obtain points.

Play the game by using the spacebar.  Hold the spacebar to rotate and release the spacebar to move in the direction of your arrow.  Upon releasing the spacebar, the player will shoot a projectile backwards. The green orbs are worth 1 point each and each shield will be equip upon collection and destroyed on contact with any kind of enemy or hazard.

This game is made by Jib Leekitwattana, harristsui, and Cole Masaki.
